title: Miley Cyrus admits thinking she ‘always had to be gay’ as 'men were evil'
text:
It seems Cody seems to have changed Miley’s mind about dating (Picture: Cody Simpson, Instagram)

Miley Cyrus appears to have taken a subtle swipe at her ex-husband Liam Hemsworth – and actually most other men – while praising her new boyfriend Cody Simpson as ‘good people’.

The Wrecking Ball singer hopped on her Instagram live on Sunday evening to share some dating advice for her 100 million Instagram followers while drawing on her own experience.

With Cody, 22, sharing her live screen, Miley explained how she thought she ‘had to be gay’ with the assumption that all men were ‘evil’.

Explaining why it took her so long to start dating Cody despite knowing each other for years, Miley said: ‘I was being a little too hardcore for him and his vibes and not allowing anyone in but now I am.’

Appearing to take a swipe at her estranged husband Liam Hemsworth, the popstar continued: ‘There are good people out there that just happen to have d**ks. I’ve only ever met one, and he’s on this live.’

Addressing her sexuality, Miley continued: ‘There are good men out there guys, don’t give up.

‘You don’t have to be gay, there are good people with d**ks out there, you’ve just got to find them.’

Miley began dating Cody last month (Picture: Cody Simpson, Instagram)

She added: ‘I just always thought I had to be gay because all guys were evil but it’s not true.’

The popstar closed her live by sharing sweet sentiments with her new beau, telling him: ‘Miss you babe.’

Miley, 26, announced her split from Liam, 29, in August after seven months of marriage. Days after, she went public with her romance with The Hills star Kaitlynn Carter, whom she dated for two months.

Miley and Liam split this summer (Picture: Rex Features)

Last month, the We Can’t Stop singer was romantically linked to Australian swimmer Cody and the pair have been inseparable since.

Rumours are rife that the couple have moved in together after Cody shared an Instagram story with boxes behind him and the caption: ‘Movin in.’

The pair fuelled the speculation during the Instagram live while discussing their shared driveway and garage.

Cody revealed: ‘We got matching Teslas! Mine’s dirty, hers is clean.’

Miley replied: ‘Mine’s not clean. Mine’s dirty because mine is sitting in the driveway because yours is in the garage!’

Basically, they’re well and truly smitten.
